alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 2:10PM MST until March 09 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Light to moderate snow. Total snow accumulations generally ranging from 2 to 4 inches. * WHERE...East central Wyoming into the northern Nebraska Panhandle including Douglas, Lusk, Harrison, Chadron, and Alliance. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; Niobrara County
